Posts Helping clutter the internet

Getting on board with jekyll

I’ve been playing with the idea of utilizing services around the web to host a website completely free. There is no shortage of options available, but most have limitations to what you can do, or how your site can look. I’ve heard quite a bit about jekyll, mostly in concert with GitHub Pages. I like everything I’ve seen so far, so this is me giving it a spin.
